column4: Excuse me if this is a dumb question, but is it possible for me to host my own site without a static ip address?
You need to register your site at dyndns or no-ip.com and you can.  I have one hosted (although I'm getting it set up right now)
You'll need to get their dynamic IP udater (whichever site you use) and that will keep you synched up.
Do you know of any good tutorials of how to get it all set up?
